PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-07882024-06-21PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BENJAMIN NYCUM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of J. Pauline Rafferty, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BENJAMIN NYCUM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of J. Pauline Rafferty, whose term has expired.
